KiiRAGIII, 12.00 hours, 1st June, 1948* R. 14.00 hours, 1st June, 1948. No. 582.' Please pass following message from Cable and Wireless # Karachi, to Prodrome, Teheran in cypher. Begins . Colonel H.C.G. Bloodworth. Divisional manager Cable and Wireless Ltd., Persian Gulf. Paying official visit Teheran early June. Would be grateful if you could arrange hotel a c c ammoda tio n. COPILS TO: Copy to P.0, for retransmission to P.0. (Eastern Dept.) P.0. (General Dept.)

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Pol Ext 16303/48 'Col. H.C.G. Bloodworth's official visit to Teheran'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a telegram from the British High Commission to Pakistan requesting accommodation in Tehran for an official visit by Colonel H C G Bloodworth of Cable and Wireless Ltd.
